//DARK LORD
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define _ ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
#define max(a,b)                 (a>=b?a:b)
#define min(a,b)                 (a<b?a:b)
#define max3(a,b,c)               max(a,max(b,c))
#define min3(a,b,c)               min(a,min(b,c))
#define f0(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define f1(i,n) for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
#define f11(i,n) for(i=1;i<n;i++)
#define fn(i,n) for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define mod 1000000007
#define T() int t;cin>>t;while(t--)
inline ll modexp(ll a,ll b){ll x=1;while(b>0){if(b&1){x*=a;if(x>=mod)x%=mod;};b>>=1;a*=a;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;}return x;}
inline ll digSum(ll n){ll s=0;n=abs(n);while(n){s+=(n%10);n/=10;}return s;}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	_
	T(){
		ll r,c,area1,area2,area3,flag=0,x,y,p,q,l,m;
		cin>>r>>c>>area1>>area2>>area3;
		y=r;x=c;p=c;q=r;l=c;m=r;
		if(r*c != area1 + area2 +area3)
			cout<<"No\n";
		else{
			if(area1%r == 0 || area1%c == 0){
				if(area1%r == 0){
					x = x - area1/r;
					if(area2%r == 0 || area2%x == 0|| area3%x==0||area3%r==0)
						flag = 1;
				}
				 if(area1%c == 0){
					y = y - area1/c;
					if(area2%y == 0 || area2%c == 0|| area3%c==0||area3%y==0)
						flag = 1;
				}
			}
				if(area2%r == 0 || area2%c == 0){
				if(area2%r == 0){
					p =p- area2/r;
					if(area1%r == 0 || area1%p == 0|| area3%p==0||area3%r==0)
						flag = 1;
				}
				 if(area2%c == 0){
					q = q - area2/c;
					if(area1%q == 0 || area1%c == 0|| area3%c==0||area3%q==0)
						flag = 1;
				}
			}
				if(area3%r == 0 || area3%c == 0){
				if(area3%r == 0){
					l =l - area3/r;
					if(area2%r == 0 || area2%l == 0|| area1%l==0||area1%r==0)
						flag = 1;
				}
				 if(area3%c == 0){
					m = m - area3/c;
					if(area2%m == 0 || area2%c == 0|| area1%c==0||area1%m==0)
						flag = 1;
				}
			}
			if(flag)
			cout<<"Yes\n";
			else cout<<"No\n";
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}
